body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
It is a mistake to register a delayed callback after calling ExecuteWorkflow. But some users do it and it is hard to troubleshoot.

**Describe the solution you'd like**
Panic on RegisterDelayedCallback after ExecuteWorkflow was called.

comments.body: +1 just ran into the same issue and spent 1h troubleshooting. Definitely user issue, but was hard to debug and `panic` would be neat.

title: TestWorkflowEnvironment: Fail RegisterDelayedCallback after ExecuteWorkflow
